trends: There have been 3 other sightings in King's Lynn
There was one other sighting in King's Lynn on or around December 18th 1992
divs: sighting detailsi was driving a vehicle delivering the last pizza for the night. 2345pm! observed on housing estate some quarter-mile in sky, a very large looking star. blush-silver four points. slowed vehicle to stop and switched off engine, ( a automatic-procedure for one whom ran a ufo-group and had seen three other ufos.) watched star-form for about two-minutes, then it the star suddenly went-out vanished! wound down drivers window on van to see any further phenomena? i was quickly rewarded\ observed in the very clear crisp night sky a oval-craft some forty feet in length and ten=ft from base to dome-aperture at top. i watched from the van as it moved less than 5mph, clearly observed the following happen, some eighty-ft in the air. bright clear night a few celestial stars. the craft was a rusty red colour the hull reminding one of metal just removed from a furnace and "cooling-down"! there was no audible sound whatsoever, and as i watched for a further minute i then saw an array of orange-lights, "or to be more precise" exhaust-ports! switch on, they revolved slowly around the base in a clockwise-fashion observing from underneath. then by way of some unknown emission from these ports a portal began to emerge. i clearly saw spacetime becoming a mirrored-flux, a shaking of space and thence the very slow moving craft entered into this created flux and dissapeared. so i have come to the conclusion that\ the large-star shape i first observed some ten-minutes earlier was in fact an opening time portal or gate into our world. created by this craft which i then saw some minutes later and thence watched it create another time-portal in front of mine eyes! i have had two previous encounters with ufo craft less than twenty-ft away, and other out of world experiences. i am now arranging to see a regressionist to be put under and the result videoed\audioed and thence posted to u-tube!
Summary: encounter with oval-craft witch crated time-portal/gate in front of my eyes less than eighty-ft away in airspace.
